entry.title: S4 HANA "Profit Center" in line item 0o1 not filled during mid-year legacy asset transfer
entry.content:
When I doing mid-year legacy asset transfer, there always have a error message Balancing field "Profit Center" in line item 0o1 not filled . 

* Specify Account Assignment Types for Account Assignment Objects  already configured.

entry.title: My blog does not get posted since 3 weeks
entry.content:
I have written a blog and it is submitted for review since 3 weeks.When will it be posted?

I have made myself familiar with the respective blog posting rules, it is even reviewed by my UA,

best regards,

Michael

entry.title: SAP Community AI Conversation Chatbot to ask Q&A?
entry.content:
Do you have some place where we can ask Qs to get quick answers based tons of community questions been answered and accepted as solution... This will benefit for us instead of waiting for answer from community colleagues... SAP Community is having huge knowledge database which can be utilised in a better way so this will increase more non SAP colleagues to join SAP community to get more members .. Do you have vector db for us to use

Any APIs do you plan to release which we can build our own chatbot in Gradio or streamlit

entry.title: Access denied to my old blogs
entry.content:
Hello!

Because of e-mail address changes I was often forced to create new user IDs; I tried to link them to my actual active account, but when I am trying to access my old blogs from this list: https://community.sap.com/t5/blogs/blogusercontributedarticlespage/user-id/174029/blog-id/additional-blog-members for each entry I receive the error message that the access is denied.

entry.title: MI07 Problema na atribui√ß√£o de impostos (J1BTAX) em NF gerada por invent√°rio
entry.content:
Ol√°, pessoal!
Estou com uma situa√ß√£o no SAP ECC relacionada √† nota fiscal gerada automaticamente por invent√°rio, onde apenas o primeiro item da nota tem a redu√ß√£o de base de ICMS corretamente atribu√≠da. Os demais itens assumem grupos fiscais gen√©ricos (10/99), ignorando o cadastro correto da J1BTAX.

Cen√°rio:
A nota √© gerada automaticamente ap√≥s movimenta√ß√£o de invent√°rio (ex: MB1A / 701).

A J1BTAX est√° corretamente configurada para todos os materiais.

A fun√ß√£o J_1B_IM_TX_CALCULATE_TAX_NEW √© chamada para o c√°lculo fiscal, e percebi que o problema acontece no PERFORM get_tax_parameters, onde para os itens a partir do segundo, o sistema j√° n√£o localiza os grupos corretos.

A estrutura XKOMV[] j√° chega preenchida na fun√ß√£o, mas aparentemente os KSCHL n√£o refletem as condi√ß√µes como acontece na MIRO.

Testes j√° realizados:
Executei o mesmo cen√°rio via MIRO: os impostos s√£o aplicados corretamente a todos os itens.

Revisei a J_1BCONDMAPV, e os KSCHL est√£o mapeados corretamente.

Comparei a J1BTAX e o grupo de impostos por material ‚Äî est√° tudo certo.

Debuguei a fun√ß√£o e percebi que ap√≥s o 1¬∫ item, a l√≥gica de atribui√ß√£o de grupo fiscal n√£o consegue recuperar os dados da J1BTAX.

Na MIRO, o grupo fiscal √© atribu√≠do corretamente a todos os itens ‚Äî no invent√°rio, apenas ao primeiro.

Pergunta:
Existe alguma particularidade na chamada da fun√ß√£o de c√°lculo de imposto quando a nota √© gerada por movimento de mercadoria (invent√°rio), que afete a leitura correta da J1BTAX ou do mapeamento fiscal?

Ou ainda:

Alguma recomenda√ß√£o de nota SAP, configura√ß√£o complementar ou workaround para garantir que todos os itens da nota de invent√°rio tenham os impostos atribu√≠dos corretamente?

entry.title: No preliminary cost estimate for product cost collector 700131 found
entry.content:
Hi,

when I'm trying to create a Cost estimate for product cost collector with WIP(MTS / Product costing by period) I'm getting the below error

 

i have run CK40N for this product 

just wanted to let you know that BOM and routing both exists   

I have maintained MRP4 

OSP2

 

version 

but earlier when i have created a product cost collector without WIP then it worked  and i was able to do all the steps till settlement with no issue

OSP2

entry.title: Why does including hyperlinks change my paragraph's structure?
entry.content:
Hello @SAP, 

Just recently I noticed that my paragraph's structuring is changed drastically. This is happening retrospectively as all of my past blogs look affected. For example Preliminary What‚Äôs New Information for SAP S/4HANA... - SAP Community. 

I also tested this by creating a draft without any hyperlinks. The structure remains fine. As soon as I include the hyperlinks, the whole structure shifts around:

The text looks fine in the editing window. I double checked the HTML and there is no extra space included:

Is this a bug? Or am I doing something incorrect?

Thank you,

Diana

entry.title: Blog post still shows "Awaiting Review" after 2 days ‚Äì request for moderation status
entry.content:

https://community.sap.com/t5/technology-blog-posts-by-members/build-and-deploy-a-full-stack-sap-capm-app-with-fiori-ui-on-sap-btp-cloud/ba-p/14124971

Thanks & regards,
Madhan

entry.title: Blog Post Disappeared After ‚ÄúAwaiting Review‚Äù ‚Äì Requesting Clarification
entry.content:

My SAP profile: https://people.sap.com/ajay43

Thank you in advance for your help!

‚Äî Ajay

entry.title: Query on Multilevel and Period Control Methods in SAP Public Cloud
entry.content:
Hi, can anyone clarify where I can find the list of standard multilevel methods and period control methods available in SAP Public Cloud, apart from what's shown in the depreciation key details? Also, is it possible to change the percentage rates in a multilevel method in the Public Cloud?

Thanks in advance.

entry.content:

Please suggest , How can we achieve it SAP public cloud  while billing VF01 ?

Thanks in Advance.

entry.title: SAP Ariba Sourcing
entry.content:
Dear all, My name is Emma Grant and I work for the United Nations, and we are using SAP Ariba Sourcing Classic.  I would like to enquire from other users whether you have started to use Guided Sourcing? if so what issues have you faced, and also whether you have been part of any forum where you have raised issues that you are dealing with and any resolutions that have been provided.  We have raised a list of things that are worse with guided and functionality that seems to have gone backwards. 

Any advise will be gratefully received and I look forward to hearing from you.

entry.title: While running MRP live source list is not updating in Purchase requisition
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

I am running MRP live in S/4 Hana 2023 version.

With following all mandatory check and master data setup for Info record and source also activated with MRP relevant 1 and material master also update correctly but still Purchase requisition created without source of supply during MRP live. 

If I run classic MRP all details comes automatically Source list aggreement MPN no. Also.

Can you please provide solutions for this what to setup any missing link or Sap notes to be implemented??

entry.title: inventory audit report, with added 2-column input date for comparison
entry.content: Dear Experts, is there a sample script, such as an inventory audit report (item, accumulated qty, and value) with additional 2-column input for different dates for comparison. Thank you

entry.title: Duplicate MATMAS IDoc Generation via POIM and BD10 ‚Äì How to Prevent It?
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

I'm currently facing an issue while sending IDocs to an external system. The IDoc types involved are: MATMAS, LOIBOM, LOIWCS, LOIROU, and CLFMAS.

To trigger the IDocs, I‚Äôm using the transactions POIM and BD10:

  • When I run POIM, it always generates a MATMAS IDoc along with the others. As far as I can tell, this behavior cannot be suppressed.
  • Afterwards, I use BD10 to send a CLFMAS IDoc for classification data. However, BD10 also automatically generates and sends a MATMAS IDoc, even though it was already sent via POIM.

This results in the material master being sent twice with each export. Once via POIM and again via BD10.

My question: Is there a way to prevent BD10 from generating the MATMAS IDoc when it has already been sent via POIM?
Alternatively, is there another method to send CLFMAS without triggering another MATMAS?

Any insights or experiences would be greatly appreciated!

entry.title: SAP managed tags will be disappear after edit a blog
entry.content:
Hi colleagues,

After a new blog was posted in the community, I need edit it , and the SAP managed tags will be disappear after edit blogs , you have to enter the SAP managed tags again and post it .

Please double check it since it realy lower the friendly usability.

entry.title: Blog It Forward ‚Äì Marla Alschweiki
entry.content:
I‚Äôm happy to join the Blog It Forward ‚Äì The Sequel challenge and share a bit about myself and my SAP journey.

About Me

I started my SAP career over 8 years ago as a software developer and later specialized in SAP Data Analytics, AI, and intelligent applications. Today, I work as a Senior Data & AI Development Consultant at PwC, focusing on SAP AI Core, SAP BDC, SAP S/4HANA Data Analytics, RAP, and Fiori/UI5 development.

I‚Äôm passionate about contributing to the SAP Community, sharing knowledge, and taking part in events like SAP TechEd. When I‚Äôm not working, I‚Äôm usually with my puppy Carlo, exploring the nature around us, or joining Carlo in a new adventure outdoors.üê∂üòÅ

 

 

Fun Fact

I live in a small but lively city in Germany, surrounded by nature yet well-connected to the tech community. Germany is home to more than 25,000 castles and palaces, many tucked away in small towns and forests, perfect for weekend exploration.

Answering Some Blog It Forward Questions

If I were 20 again, what would I study?
I‚Äôd still choose technology all over again, but I would add more AI and data science earlier in my studies.

Describe in one short sentence: ‚ÄúWhat need does your SAP solution meet‚Äù?
I design solutions that turn data into actionable insights, making processes smarter and decisions faster.

What‚Äôs the best lesson you‚Äôve learned?
To work hard, stay true to myself, and keep learning every day.

Five Things I Want to Achieve

  • See the Northern Lights  üåå
  • Help rescued pets find homes üê∂
  • Publish a book about AI and SAP üìò
  • pay it forward and mentor young tech professionals üë©‚Äçüíª
  • Live by the sea üåä

Blogging It Forward

I‚Äôd like to blog it forward to:

  • @TammyPowlas  for her great experience as a SAP mentor 

  • @Vitaliy-Rfor her inspiring work in SAP development

My questions for you:

  1. What‚Äôs one SAP skill you wish you had learned earlier?

  2. If you could combine any SAP technology with AI, what would you build?

#BIF #Blogitforward
